name: Mibus Unab | App IOS/Android
description:
Mibus Unab is an app that was born out of the need to monitor the location of the institutional bus, in order to create this prototype, I was based on different platforms such as uber and waze, in addition to other designs that colleagues have shared.


This version of the app has as a plus, being able to notify the driver at which stop you are, so that the driver takes your presence into account, in addition, the driver has the option of delaying the waiting time in case of a traffic jam. or other event.


The app will be available for IOS and Android soon...
